The announcement must be made through official Amazon channels and the law must be verifiable through official legislative records.

question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) The United Kingdom holds a general election, and (b) Amazon publicly announces a lobbying effort that results in the passage of a federal law in the United States?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (a) The United Kingdom holds a general election between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, and the election is officially recognized with results recorded by the UK Electoral Commission. (b) Amazon publicly announces, between the creation date of this question and January 1, 2028, that its lobbying efforts have resulted in the passage of a federal law in the United States. The announcement must be made through official Amazon channels and the law must be verifiable through official legislative records.

question.title: Will NATO deploy nuclear weapons in a member country for the first time since 2024 before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028, NATO deploys nuclear weapons in a member country for the first time since 2024. The deployment must be officially confirmed by NATO through a public announcement or official documentation.

question.title: Will China achieve net positive energy output from a nuclear fusion reactor before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, a nuclear fusion reactor in China achieves net positive energy output, meaning the reactor produces more energy than it consumes. The achievement must be verified by a reputable scientific organization or governmental body.

question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) NATO deploys nuclear weapons in a member country for the first time since 2024, and (b) China achieves net positive energy output from a nuclear fusion reactor?
question.body: (a) This will occur if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, NATO deploys nuclear weapons in a member country for the first time since 2024, with the deployment being officially confirmed by NATO through a public announcement or official documentation. (b) This will occur if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, a nuclear fusion reactor in China achieves net positive energy output, meaning the reactor produces more energy than it consumes, with the achievement verified by a reputable scientific organization or governmental body.

question.title: Will Taiwan officially adopt an AI ethics framework based on philosophical principles before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028, Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework that explicitly references philosophical principles. The adoption must be confirmed through official government documentation or announcements.

question.title: Will the US Supreme Court rule on an energy policy case before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the US Supreme Court issues a ruling on a case concerning energy policy at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The ruling must be documented in the official records of the Supreme Court.

question.title: Will both of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (a) Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework based on philosophical principles, and (b) the US Supreme Court rules on an energy policy case?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if BOTH of the following conditions are met: (1) Between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework that explicitly references philosophical principles, confirmed through official government documentation or announcements. (2) The US Supreme Court issues a ruling on a case concerning energy policy at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, documented in the official records of the Supreme Court.

question.title: Will Australia or Norway hold a referendum on any national issue before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either Australia or Norway holds a referendum on any national issue between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The referendum must be officially recognized and its results recorded by the respective country's official electoral body.

question.title: Will Russia officially withdraw from the Paris Agreement before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028. The withdrawal must be confirmed by official UNFCCC documentation.

question.title: Will either Australia or Norway hold a referendum on any national issue and will Russia officially withdraw from the Paris Agreement before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if both of the following conditions are met: (1) Either Australia or Norway holds a referendum on any national issue between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, with the referendum being officially recognized and its results recorded by the respective country's official electoral body. (2) Russia officially notifies the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) of its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement and completes the withdrawal process before January 1, 2028, with the withdrawal confirmed by official UNFCCC documentation.
